T

textArea - Variable in class network.Connect4Server
A reference to the waiting player
tie - Variable in class core.Connect4
Indicates whether the game has resulted in a tie (The board is full, no possible moves)
tie() - Method in class core.Connect4
Generates the tie status message
turn(String) - Method in class core.Connect4
Generates the status message indicating which players turn it is
turn - Variable in class network.GameState
 
turn - Variable in class ui.Connect4TextConsole
